Posts.EditableText:
So, the issue I've got here is that I want to remove the 'You are in a' prefix that appears whenever a player enters this one particular room. If it helps any, the room is listed as an 'object and/or room'. I'm aware I can clear the description prefix on the room tab, but that doesn't seem to actually do anything as at the very top it will instead still state 'A _______'. (with the ____ replaced with the room name).

Is there any way to remove the 'A' prefix too or am I stuck with it?
Posts.HTML:
So, the issue I've got here is that I want to remove the 'You are in a' prefix that appears whenever a player enters this one particular room. If it helps any, the room is listed as an 'object and/or room'. I'm aware I can clear the description prefix on the room tab, but that doesn't seem to actually do anything as at the very top it will instead still state 'A _______'. (with the ____ replaced with the room name).

Is there any way to remove the 'A' prefix too or am I stuck with it?

Posts.EditableText: The A disappears when you uncheck "Use default prefix and suffix" in the Room "Setup" tab
Posts.HTML: The A disappears when you uncheck "Use default prefix and suffix" in the Room "Setup" tab
